```{r}
multiplot <- function(..., plotlist=NULL, file, cols=1, layout=NULL) {
  require(grid)

  # Make a list from the ... arguments and plotlist
  plots <- c(list(...), plotlist)

  numPlots = length(plots)

  # If layout is NULL, then use 'cols' to determine layout
  if (is.null(layout)) {
    # Make the panel
    # ncol: Number of columns of plots
    # nrow: Number of rows needed, calculated from # of cols
    layout <- matrix(seq(1, cols * ceiling(numPlots/cols)),
                    ncol = cols, nrow = ceiling(numPlots/cols))
  }

 if (numPlots==1) {
    print(plots[[1]])

  } else {
    # Set up the page
    grid.newpage()
    pushViewport(viewport(layout = grid.layout(nrow(layout), ncol(layout))))

    # Make each plot, in the correct location
    for (i in 1:numPlots) {
      # Get the i,j matrix positions of the regions that contain this subplot
      matchidx <- as.data.frame(which(layout == i, arr.ind = TRUE))

      print(plots[[i]], vp = viewport(layout.pos.row = matchidx$row,
                                      layout.pos.col = matchidx$col))
    }
  }
}
```

```{r}
sse <- function(vector){
  activationValues <- vector[c(6:25)]
  prototype <- vector[c((length(vector) - 19) : length(vector))]
  difference <- as.numeric(activationValues) - as.numeric(prototype)
  se <- difference ** 2
  sse <- sum(se)
  return(sse)
}

cosineSim <- function(vector){
  activationValues <- vector[c(6:25)]
  prototype <- vector[c((length(vector) - 19) : length(vector))]
  
  v1 <- as.vector(as.matrix(as.numeric(activationValues) + 1))
  v2 <- as.vector(as.matrix(as.numeric(prototype) + 1))

  cosine <- lsa::cosine(v1, v2)
  return(cosine)
}
```

```{r}
i <- 1
# for each pout file, clean and plot it
for(i in c(1:length(output))){
  data <- output[i]
  df <- read.csv(data, header = FALSE)
  names(df)[1:5] <- c('time', 'agent', 'numUpdate', 'isUpdated', 'inflId')
  prototype <- c((ncol(df) - 19) : ncol(df))
  activationValues <- c(6:25)

  df2 <- df

  df2$sse <- apply(df2, MARGIN = 1, sse)
  df2$cos <- apply(df2, 1, cosineSim)

  df2$cos80 <- ifelse(df2$cos >= .8, 1, 0)
  df2$cos90 <- ifelse(df2$cos >= .9, 1, 0)
  df2$ifEverUpdated <- ifelse(df2$numUpdate >= 1, 1, 0)

  df3 <- df2 %>%
    group_by(time) %>%
    summarize(avgSse = mean(sse),
              avgCos = mean(cos),
              cumAgentUpdate = sum(ifEverUpdated),
              n = n(),
              propCos80 = sum(cos80) / n(),
              propCos90 = sum(cos90) / n()
              ) %>%
    mutate(freq = cumAgentUpdate / n)
```
